mean_cn: adj. 天真的，不懂世故的，朴质无华的
mean_en: not having or showing a lot of experience and knowledge about the world and about culture, art, literature, etc.
sentence: You're young, simple, and unsophisticated, and I love you for that!
sentence_trans: 你很年轻、单纯，而且不懂世故，我爱的就是这样的你！
word_etyma: un不+soph智慧+istic关于...的+ated有...的→unsophisticated不懂世故的
